titles: A sea grammar vvith the plaine exposition of Smiths Accidence for young sea-men, enlarged. Diuided into fifteene chapters: what they are you may partly conceiue by the contents. Written by Captaine Iohn Smith, sometimes gouernour of Virginia, and admirall of Nevv-England.
author: Smith, John, 1580-1631.
Smith, John, 1580-1631. Sea-mans grammar.
notes: An enlarged and rearranged version of "An accidence".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Naval art and science --  Early works to 1800.
